title: Some Republicans Want to Count Votes by Hand. Bad Idea, Experts Say.
description: Republican county officials, as well as candidates for statewide offices, suggest that counting by hand would be more reliable than machine tabulation. Research shows the opposite.

title: Netflix Reverses Decline, Adding 2.4 Million Subscribers
description: Netflix, which has about 223 million subscribers worldwide, will soon introduce a lower-priced service with ads in a bid to attract more customers.

title: Amazon Labor Union Loses Election at Warehouse Near Albany
description: By a 2-to-1 margin, the group marked its second defeat after a surprise victory in April on Staten Island.

title: Meta Forced to Sell Giphy After British Antitrust Order
description: The sale is the first time Meta has been forced by regulators to sell a part of its business, a sign of increased antitrust scrutiny around the world.
